DOC.brief_summary: This study compare mechanical sphincter augmentation ( LINX Reflux Management System ) double-dose proton pump inhibitor ( PPIs ) management reflux symptom related gastroesophageal reflux disease ( GERD ) .
DOC.brief_title: The CALIBER Study Randomized Controlled Trial LINX Versus Double-Dose Proton Pump Inhibitor Therapy Reflux Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , multicenter , 2:1 randomize , cross-over , two arm - Control arm : Double-dose PPI [ Omeprazole 20 mg BID ( twice day ) ] - Treatment arm : LINX Reflux Management System Up 20 study center throughout U.S. participate . Approximately150 patient enrol study . Subjects randomize 2:1 double-dose PPIs arm ( 100 subject ) LINX arm ( 50 subject ) .
